example.name: semi-idiomatic: cock a snook
example.text: ... in choosing to be a bride of Christ they inevitably cocked a snook at lesser male fry .
example.note: To 'cock a snook' is to open the palm of the hand extending all fingers, place the thumb on the nose, and waggle the fingers in an inflamatory way. There seems to be some agreement that the usage of 'cock' relates to placing the hand/gesture in an upright position, which is why it's included in this sense. Apparently this is also known as a 'Queen Anne's Fan' or a 'five fingered salute'.
example.arg: in choosing to be a bride of Christ
